Welcome to the Centre for Applied Data Science (CADS) at HOGENT University of Applied Sciences and Arts. We specialize in extracting value from data through collection, organization, analysis, and accessibility. Our team tackles diverse data-related challenges, offering expertise in Data Engineering, AI, and Geospatial Data Science. We partner with various stakeholders to create innovative, data-driven solutions. For inquiries, collaborations, or advice, contact our experts or email us at [cads@hogent.be](mailto::cads@hogent.be). Explore our projects and initiatives on our website or engage with us on LinkedIn and GitHub.

We look forward to working with you!
